i18n.key: You have to validate the parameters and the contents shown below. The ″page parameters″ tab provides the main information related to the name, referencing, page template and publishing dates. The ″Page content″ tab displays the contents as the visitor will see it, once the page is published. To continue, insert a comment that will be sent to the page author, and click on the ″accept″ or ″refuse″ button on top right of this screen.
